channel.title: { Juan Quintana }
channel.description: Blog and website of Juan Quintana, blogging mainly for tech. Opinions expressed are mine.

item.title: Awesome WM for a nice Linux experience
item.description: Linux is not only a very convenient enviroment to develop but also is the best way to take adventange of all posibilities provided for a personal computer. An operative system based on Linux allow customize the enviroment and the use of a very complete compedium of tools. On the other hand, Awesome Windows Manager is a level more to get the best experience with your system and your activity with Linux. This one is a dynamic window manager for the X Window System developed in the C and Lua programming languages. Lua is also used for configuring and extending the window manager. Its development began as a fork of dwm. It aims to be extremely small and fast, yet extensively customizable and make it possible for the user to productively manage windows with the use of keyboard. It is another world.

item.title: Jekyll Quick Start
item.description: The userâ€™s taste and needs of developers about webpages changes very quickly. Users require awesome websites with a very clear exposition of the information. On the other hand, developers need tools easy to be deployed and specially easy to be filled, customized and updated. Jekyll Bootstrap provides with a very powerfull tool to create awesome websites in a few minutes.

item.title: Welcome to the tutorial of { Personal } Jekyll Theme!
item.description: This theme was developed by Panos Sakkos using the framework Jekyll Bootstrap. Later it was modified and customized according to my needs.
